text: Cory Wells (born Emil Lewandowski; February 5, 1941 â€“ October 20, 2015) was an American singer. He was one of the three lead vocalists in the band Three Dog Night. He was born in Buffalo, New York. Wells died suddenly in his sleep on October 20, 2015 at his home in Dunkirk, New York. He was 74 years old. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Singers from Buffalo, New York
title: Cory Wells
